Detailed Description

Basic structure returned by a Config object.

Describes all information about the run that is collected from the configuration file - such as override values and data locations

Todo:
: Make RunInfo serializable so it can be sent as an MPI message?
Todo:
: Make RunInfo saveable (i.e. write out a config file containing all the settings. This can be written to each run output dir so you can check what settings were used at the last parameterization. You can then use a Config object to parse the saved settings and check if the RunInfo has changed as a robust check for reparameterizing. Save() load() compare()
